configuration.description: Activates the JTI check: access tokens can only be used once to guard against replay attacks
Validity period of cached StatusList2021 credential entries in milliseconds.

extensions.name: IdentityHub Core Services Extension
extensions.overview: This extension provides core services for the IdentityHub that are not intended to be user-replaceable.

configuration.description: Alias for the private key that is intended for signing status list credentials
The iteration wait time in milliseconds in the issuance process state machine. Default value 1000
The batch size in the issuance process state machine. Default value 20
How many times a specific operation must be tried before terminating the issuance with error
The base delay for the issuance retry mechanism in millisecond
Period (in seconds) at which the Watchdog thread checks all stored credentials for their status. Configuring a number <=0 disables the Watchdog.
Initial delay (in seconds) before the Watchdog thread begins its work.
Self-issued ID Token expiration in minutes. By default is 5 minutes
